A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 'The Last Jedi' is definitely surprising\, and takes life-time fans on a journey that feels like a rollercoaster. It contains some of the best moments of the saga\, but also some elements most fans may not be happy about. To me\, it feels like a painful but needed break-up: it may end the Star Wars as we used to know it\, but it opens a new and promising chapter in the franchise. Ryan Johnson may not please everyone\, but he definitely took his chance and made 'something truly special'.
